org.jmc
Class Region

java.lang.Object
  org.jmc.Region
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Chunk>
public class Region
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Chunk>

Region file class. This file contains individual chunks. It can be either the old MCRegion format or the new Anvil format.

Author:
danijel

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class Region.ChunkIterator
          Small internal class for iterating chunks in the region file.

iterator

public java.util.Iterator<Chunk> iterator()
Returns the chunk iterator for the given file. It allows to iterate the chunks within the file in the following manner: 
for(Chunk chunk:region) {}

Specified by:
iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Chunk>
